topics.body:
Hey guys anyone know new aircraft being made?
I mean like the Chinese J-20 fighters supposedly equal to the F-22 in performance, claimed by China.

Or the new Pak-50, I personally don't mind it since it looks a lot better than the F-35.

And on the note, who here even likes the F-35? The big aviation project which is now on the verge of bankrupting the US since its gotten so much support and hasn't provided much of a return. In all seriousness I think they probably should have diverted funds into making more F-22s.
topics.author: 5046d66d7f123b38980018c6

topics.body:
"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53eacdad63687226287a0000#post_53eacdad63687226287a0000

LOL, I love satire stuff, though I have to wonder why they'd even need money.
You know some really awesome quote? 

"If I were not an atheist, I would believe in a God who would choose to save people on the basis of the totality of their lives and not the pattern of their words. I think he would prefer an honest and righteous atheist to a TV preacher whose every word is God, God, God, and whose every deed is foul, foul, foul." By Issac Asimov.
